Greetings from IIC, Francis Xavier Engineering College, Tirunelveli.
1:
We are very pleased to acknowledge your registration for the Yukti Innovation Challenge / AICTE
Productization Fellowship participation in the IIC Regional Meet, scheduled to be held on 2nd December
2025 at Francis Xavier Engineering College, Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu.
We are extremely happy that you have chosen our institution for the Regional Meet, and we eagerly look
forward to welcoming you on the day of the event.
1. Food Preference Request
To ensure smooth hospitality arrangements, we kindly request you to provide your food preference for the
event.
